title: Work & Career
part1: Why did you choose this career?
What do you like about your job?
What are the challenges in your work?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a job you would like to have in the future.
cue_card_points: why you want to do it
and explain why it interests you.

part3: How has the workplace changed in recent years?
What qualities are important for success at work?
Do you think people will change jobs more often in the future?
